content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Online features for Twisted Metal (PS3) will no longer be playable from January 31, 2019. Functionality will be affected in the following ways:

o You can play the campaign offline as well as local (couch) multiplayer in split screen mode.
o You will not be able to host or join an online game.

Get the ultimate Twisted Metal collection for the PS3™ system!

Play the games that started it all, single handedly inventing the car-combat genre.

This bundle contains:
• Twisted Metal (PSOne Classic)
• Twisted Metal 2 (PSOne Classic)
• Twisted Metal Black
• Twisted Metal
• Bonus Twisted Metal Original Soundtrack from the Video Game

Twisted Metal (PSOne Classic) and Twisted Metal 2 (PSOne Classic) have been converted from the original PlayStation® disc to the PSP® and the PS3™ systems. Twisted Metal Black has been converted from the original PlayStation®2 version to the PS3™ system. Consequently, there may be times where the titles play differently from the PlayStation® or PlayStation®2 version, or where some features may not function properly. These versions do not support PlayStation® or PlayStation®2 peripherals (controller, memory card, multitap, etc.), therefore functionalities such as multiplayer, versus, and co-op modes are not available.



Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.

Twisted Metal is a registered trademark and its characters are trademarks of Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc. © 1996 Sony Interactive Entertainment Inc. © 2001 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Twisted Metal:Black is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. ©2012 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Twisted Metal is a registered trademark in the United States and a trademark in other countries of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Developed by Eat Sleep Play, Inc.
